---
title: "Marsh species ID learning objectives"
output: html_document
css: style.css
---

Students will be able to identify the following marsh vegetation species using scientific nomenclature:

* *Spartina alterniflora* (saltmarsh cordgrass)
* *Spartina patens* (salt meadow hay)
* *Distichlis spicata* (salt grass)
* *Juncus roemerianus* (black needle rush)
* *Schoenoplectus americanus* (aka *Scirpus americanus*) (three-square)
* *Juniperus virginiana* (red cedar)
* *Pinus taeda* (loblolly pine)
* *Iva frutescens* (marsh elder)
* *Baccharis halimifolia* (groundsel)
* *Morella cerifera* (wax myrtle)
* *Phragmites australis* (Phragmites)
